title: of the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited animal health welfare forestry (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (commencement) order 2023

title: of the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 2. The 6th day of September 2023 is appointed as the day on which Part 3
text_raw:
2. The 6th day of September 2023 is appointed as the day on which Part 3 
of the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2022 (No. 4 of 2022) comes into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 September, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [468] 3
